SECTION.P: The Master’s lodgings are in a fine, old, stone house at the back of a lawn just inside the college gates. His lugubrious butler Mantel admits you into a study that smells of old books, pipe smoke and armchair leather.
‘Who’s this?’ demands the Master, looking up from his chair.
‘One of the students, I’m afraid, sir,’ says Mantel.
SECTION.p: Make a CHARISMA roll at a Difficulty of 14 .
